Package org.digijava.kernel.translator.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TranslationCallback
    Callback interface which must be passed to TrnUtil.sortByTranslation() method
    TrnUtil.MessageGroupFactory<E extends MessageGroup>
    Message group object factory
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TrnAccessUpdateQueue
    Queue for updating message records when they are accessed.
    TrnAccesTimeSaver
    Thread to save translation access time stamps.
    TrnCountry
    Wrapper object for cached countries, translated to particular language
    TrnLocale
    Wrapper object for cached locales, translated to particular language
    TrnMonth
    Wrapper object for cached months, translated to particular language
    TrnUtil  
    TrnUtil.MessageFullKeyResolver
    Resolves locale_siteid_key as key of the message
    TrnUtil.MessageKeyLocaleResolver
    Resolves locale_key as key of the message
    TrnUtil.MessageLocaleWeightComparator
    Compares messages by weight of their locals.
    TrnUtil.MessageShortKeyResolver
    Resolvs ony string key of Message.
    TrnUtil.MsgGroupScoreComparator
    Compares MessageGroup by score.
    TrnUtil.PatcherMessageGroupFactory
    Factory of patcher message groups.
    TrnUtil.StandardMessageGroupFactory
    Factory of standard message groups.
    TrnUtil.TrnDb
    Fixes all changes to translations in db.
